homePage.healthOverview: Here's an overview of your health information.

ui.mic_not_supported: Audio recording is not supported by your browser.
ui.no_supported_format: Your browser does not support any of the preferred audio recording formats (WAV, OGG, MP3, MP4). Recording is not possible.

errors.invalid_transcription_format: The server returned an invalid transcription format.
errors.generic_send_error: An error occurred while sending audio to the server.
errors.unknown_backend_error: An unknown error occurred on the server.
errors.backend_error_500: Server error (500). Please try again later.
errors.backend_error_400: Bad request to server (400). Please check the data.
errors.no_server_response: No response from the server. Please check your internet connection.

chatbot.title: Chat Assistant
chatbot.welcome_message_subtitle: Ask any questions and I'll help you understand it better.
chatbot.newTitle: How have you been feeling lately?
chatbot.subtitle: Your AI Health Assistant
chatbot.welcomeTitle: Welcome to Your AI Health Assistant
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Start by describing your symptoms or health concerns. I'm here to help you understand your health better.
chatbot.feature1Desc: Describe your symptoms for personalized insights
chatbot.feature2Desc: Use voice input for hands-free interaction
chatbot.inputHelper: Type your message or use voice input
chatbot.received_data_summary: I've processed the information. Is there anything else I can help with?
chatbot.received_data_summary_v2: Okay, I have noted that you mentioned '{{symptom}}'. Can you tell me more?
chatbot.default_reply: Sorry, I received a response I couldn't understand.

loginPage.selectLoginTypeSubtitle: Choose how you want to access the platform
loginPage.patientLoginDesc: Access your health records and consultations
loginPage.patientLoginSubtitle: Sign in to access your health dashboard
loginPage.doctorLoginSubtitle: Sign in to manage your patients

speechTestPage.title: Speech Recognition Test
speechTestPage.subtitle: Test the speech-to-text functionality by clicking the microphone button below. Your spoken words will be transcribed and displayed in real-time.
speechTestPage.transcriptionPlaceholder: Your spoken words will appear here...
speechTestPage.instruction1: Click the microphone button to start recording
speechTestPage.instruction2: Speak clearly into your device\'s microphone
speechTestPage.instruction3: Click the stop button when finished
speechTestPage.instruction4: Your speech will be transcribed and displayed above
speechTestPage.feature1Desc: Instant speech-to-text conversion with high accuracy
speechTestPage.feature2Desc: Supports multiple languages for global accessibility
speechTestPage.feature3Desc: Simple interface for testing speech recognition

summaryPage.title: Consultation Summary
